headline: Jim Cramer on Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (LOW): ‘They’re Talking About Headwinds, Headwinds, Headwinds!’
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer Latest Stocks: 23 Stocks He Just Talked About. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Lowe’s Companies, Inc. headline: Stagflation Ahead?
summary: Fed upgraded inflation expectations, and reduced the number of projected cuts in 2025. This brings up the worst-case scenario fear for the market, stagflation.
